title: [RIDGELINE] Yamaguchi Once More
content:
Ridgeline subscribers!
Hello, Craig Mod here with a dispatch on my trip to Yamaguchi city last week.
The blossoms are about to bloom! The cherries! Everyone told me this. It was supposed to be today! they’d say, sad the trees weren’t cooperating. But I didn’t mind. I’m not too fussed about the cherry blossoms in general (I’ll enjoy them if I catch them, of course) but there’s something thrilling about the almost-bloom, the just-about-to-burstness of trees on the cusp of a mega-blossom.
